channel.title: Explore Mobile App on Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Explore Mobile App on Wiki

item.title: Download and Installation
item.description: For Android, you can download the app from: Google Play Store Direct APK download For iOS/iPadOS, the app can be downloaded from the App Store. For any information or assistance, please contact support@mentalab.com and we will assist you further.

item.title: Usage
item.description: Please note that currently the app only supports Mentalab Explore Pro 8-channel devices at 250Hz. Homepage Scan and connect to nearby Explore Devices. Impedance tab Inspect impedance values. Assign channel positions. EXG tab Visualize ExG data. Dot menu: Adapt visulization settings (y-axis scaling & time window). Record raw ExG data in CSV format. Settings See device settings Adjust visualization filters Change sampling rate Disconnect Bottom bar Inspect device name, temperature, battery charge

item.title: Tests
item.description: Following are the devices we used to testing: Device OS version Lenovo Tab M9 Android 13 Samsung S23 Ultra Android 14 Zenfone 10 Android 14 Pixel 7 Pro Android 15 iPhone 13 iOS 18 Recording Tests The following tests were performed to ensure the recording functionality is working as expected. Conducted on Lenovo Tab M9 (Android 13) for 2 hours: 16 channels at 500 Hz sampling rate 16 channels at 250 Hz sampling rate Known bugs No known bugs at the moment.
